title: How to convert burger king code to rp
body:
how can i convert my burger king code to rp??
it keeps on saying that the code that i entered are invalid/wrong 
need help :/

replies.body:
You can find out how to get RP with your BK gift card using Openbucks with our [Cash & Gift Cards guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753254-Cash-and-Gift-Cards-Openbucks-).

Let me know if you have any questions.
